Detailed Description

Saturated pressure relationship for water.

Relationship between temperature and pressure at saturaion. Uses an emperical curve fit pwsdb(t) given by G. Walton in TARP. SI units.

Notes:
The advantage of this object over satp_hw, which employes the Hyland & Wexler empirical relationship, is that Walton also gives an inverse correlation, dbpws(p), allowing problem solutions without introducing T as an iteration variable.

Acceptable input set: T = 20

Equations: 
 P = pwsdb(T)
